channel.title: Chatbots auf Nicky Reinert
channel.description: Blog & projects by Nicky Reinert (Institute for Digital Challenges): web development & software development, SEO & analytics, hosting & DevOps, WordPress & Hugo, tools & projects, data protection & digital culture — plus content on AI and autism & society.

item.title: wad - about chatbots, captchas, and Chromecast
item.description: New month, new category – “We are doomed” (wad) is about “smart and new technology” that turns out to be not so smart. But new, at least. Chatbots are going to replace search engines. Aren’t they? Well, no. I asked Gemini (Google’s AI chatbot) how to update Stadia’s firmware (Google’s former gaming …
